response.title: AiT Smart One - the GameChanger smart desk
response.tagline: App-controlled smart desk - height-adjusting, fully customizable design with many built-in features.

latest_updates.text:
Hey everyone,

Thank you soooooo much for being so AWESOME!

We not only have surpassed our original goal within 2 days of launching but have also reached a whopping 350 000 USD! We appreciate your support and feedback so far. The past months weren't easy for anyone. We’re all worried about a pandemic, something that has never occurred in our lifetime before. We worry for the health of our friends and families, as well as our livelihoods as our economies are struggling all over the world. While we, at AiT may be overloaded with work, we are also overwhelmed by your love and support. THANK YOU!

Because demand seems to keep increasing for our desks, with the support of Indiegogo we made the decision to

EXTEND OUR CAMPAIGN FOR 30 MORE DAYS. 

This extension will give our team time to let more people know about all the positive effects owning a standing desk could bring to people, as well as give us a chance to reach some of our most requested stretch goals, such as the Cup Warmer&Cooler and the 5 Extra Color Options for which we have also lowered the needed funding to 550K.

Meaning that if our campaign reaches that amount, both features will automatically become available for all future and past orders!  We will also give you a chance to vote on which colors you want us to include in the five new options. We’ll be sending you a link for a survey about that in the coming days.

FAQs of Shipment

This extension will not influence the current shipping schedule, however. For those of you who have placed your order prior to this extension, you are on our priority shipping list and have nothing to worry about. The shipping will begin on a rolling basis in August. We'll be sure to follow up with more information closer to that date, while keeping you in the loop with our production journey!

Thank you

Wishing you all the best,

the AiT Team

response.title: BioVYZR: Venture Out & Breathe Easy
response.tagline: Upgrade your mask for our patent-pending powered air-filtration protective shield (N95) #PPE4ALL

latest_updates.text:
Dear Backers,

Thank you for pushing this campaign to exceed our goal by 2195%. This is a huge achievement and we couldn’t have done it without you! 

To meet our deadline, we’ve split production into two parts. Part 1 is the textile component of the BioVYZR (production underway). Part 2 is the hardware components for the air purification system (production to start shortly). This approach takes advantage of the fact that the hardware isn’t built into the visor. This way it can be easily assembled afterward.

Exactly one month ago we launched the BioVYZR 1.0 as a prototype. Since then, we’ve been in touch with hundreds of our backers, listening to your feedback and insights. It has influenced us to make some major improvements to our prototype. These are upgrades that we felt would be critical to your safety and comfort. 

Before I get into it, I want to highlight the fact that the majority of our backers are healthcare professionals (thank you nurses, anesthesiologists, paramedics, dentists, surgeons, and staff!). Their feedback has been (and will be) instrumental in helping us ensure that our product is as effective as possible. Where we initially planned to produce a separate Medical BioVYZR, we’ve decided instead to make all BioVYZRs capable of handling the demands of healthcare professionals. 

To keep it short, I will list the 5 key upgrades you can expect in your BioVYZR:

1. A (much) more powerful air filtration system  

2. An incredibly durable exterior surface material (medical-grade)

3. A simplified filter replacement mechanism (one standard size)

4. Added comfort for daily travel & journeys (hydration, windows, and pockets)

5. Sterile Drapes 

With these upgrades, all BioVYZRs have been optimized for the healthcare environment. These upgrades will greatly enhance the effectiveness and experience of wearing the visor. We've posted an in-depth overview to our blog with more details: https://www.vyzrtech.com/blogs/news/upgrading-the-biovyzr-1-0-what-you-can-expect

What do all these changes mean for our production deadline? 

Making these improvements has added 2 extra prototypes to our product development cycle and restrictions on travel to China have slowed our prototyping process. Our initial delivery range was between May 30th and June 15th. From our vantage point, that range will realistically shift to June 12th - June 30th. 

You're the first to get this information and we'll be updating our campaign page and website to reflect these changes. If you have any questions, you can always reach us at care@vyzrtech.com or talk to Erin on our website's chat window.

Stay safe and well, 

Yezin A.

response.title: HercLéon Kribi : The World's Cleanest Underwear
response.tagline: Underwear that you could wear for days, weeks, or even months without getting smelly

latest_updates.text:
Happy Friday everyone, 

We just wanted to send out a short update to get everyone on the same page. 

 

WHOA! 800 Backers!!

Wow, everyone, we've gotten to 800 backers. Honestly, we're always surprised and grateful by the amount of support our projects receive from the IGG and KS community. It's genuinely so much fun to get to design products for all of you guys, and it's even better to know that a lot of you are people that have backed our other projects before. So I'd like to say thank you to everyone that's supporting this project; you all rock, and we appreciate the love. 

 

Here's a link to do the Pre-Survey

Now, I'm sure most of you realized that we didn't ask you what size, style, or color you'd like to receive. Well, that is because we wanted to wait till the campaign had reached halfway before we sent out a survey to see what styles, sizes, and colors we should have as options. 

So, since we're nearing halfway, click here to do the pre-survey.

This survey isn't the final survey where you get to pick what your unique shipment will have, but rather, this survey will help us make sure we have the most popular options available for you to choose from at the end.

 

Getting production-ready

Due to the coronavirus, all production has been a nightmare; our bedsheets (Jax Sheets) has been late by months, we are running out of shirts, and, until last week, we couldn't even get self-cleaning masks made for our customers. With all the uncertainty, we want to start production as soon as possible. So, after we receive the results from the survey above, we're going to do our best to get production-ready, so that we don't have to be stuck in production hell like every other project. 

 

Name changed from Fjord to Kribi

When we were working on this project, it gained the codename Fjord because a Fjord is defined as a deep inlet of the sea between high cliffs. This made us think of a butt (I know, we're strange), so we worked with that name for a while. Well, it turns out, if you're decently good at Googling things, you'll find a British company that sells Fjord underwears too. So, to make everyone's lives easier (and not to get sued), we changed the underwear name from Fjord to Kribi. Kribi is a beach town in Cameroon that I've always wanted to visit, but also, if you look at a map of Cameroon, it looks like it's on the butt of the country, so we figured Kribi works as the new name. 

 

On the personal side of things

Hey everyone, if you don't know me, my name is Wen. I am the founder of HercLéon, and I lead most of the material research and product testing. I love materials and enjoy sharing what I know about materials with those who are interested, so if you'd like to learn more, need help picking materials (sheets, shirts, etc.), or want to chat, please feel free to email me. My life goal is to help people reduce their carbon footprint as much as possible, so we as a society can live a sustainable life.

Nevertheless, I do want to thank you for supporting this project, and I look forward to hearing how you like your new underwear. 

 

What to do now? 

Take pre-survey by clicking here

Email me with any questions or if you just want to say hello

Have a wonderful weekend

  3. Have a wonderful weekend

response.title: MONSTER X: The Future of Portable Power Stations
response.tagline: 2,000W AC Outputs | 1,287Wh | Solar Input | Lifetime Warranty | Can Even Charge An Electric Vehicle

latest_updates.text:
Dear Backers,

Thank you for being a part of our incredible journey to bring Monster X to life. Before we launched, we didn’t know who else would be as excited about our idea as we were. Now, because of your support and the support of 1,444 backers, we’ll be able to start mass production very soon.  

 If you have friends or family who would be interested in supporting this project, it’s not too late. We’re keeping our campaign open in InDemand to give more people an opportunity to join in.

Our priority is to deliver on our commitments to you and we’ll keep you updated on our progress. As we hunker down to make Monster X a reality, you can expect to receive open, honest, & substantive updates from us monthly. Feel free to contact us via crowdfund@all-power.top if you have any questions in the interim. Thanks again for your support!

 

All the best,

Team Monster X

latest_updates.text:
Hey Giggo Friends!

 We are so excited to speak to all our Giggo Friends; your Giggo Pro toothbrush is in the production process!! As promised, we will try our best to ship them out in June. It is truly important for us to deliver the best product possible, so please be patient, Giggo Pro will accompany you in every sunny morning and good night.

Also, thanks to all of the dear backers for your love of our project very much. Our Giggo team is very grateful to everyone, and we will do our best to provide you with better service. We will arrange the delivery of the goods purchased by everyone backer as soon as possible. 

In the meantime, stay safe and warm!

Best,Giggo Team

response.title: Fat Freezer Cordless-Cryo Freeze Your Stubborn Fat
response.tagline: Fat Freezing Reinvented – Cordless At Home Patented Cryolipolysis With Therapeutic Theralight

latest_updates.text:
FAT FREEZER MEMORIAL DAY SPECIAL! – 48% OFF

 

Hey Backers! 

 

Thank you so much for the great success of the Fat Freezer CryoShape so far! We are overwhelmed by your support.

 

Our Special Memorial Day Sale is here to show you our gratitude for backing the Fat Freezer CryoShape, we reduced the price of this basket from $486 to only $249 for only 72 hours! AND BEST OF ALL FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!

 

 

Get Yours Today!

 

 

Fat Breaker 3 in 1 – Retail $199

Use after your Fat Freezer session- Muscle sculpting and Skin Smoothing to help maintain firm and supple skin. Bio-Polar Radio Frequency, Electro Muscle Stimulation and Red Photon Light Therapy. 

 

 

The Fat Freezer Chin and Neck System - Retail $99

Achieve a more radiant, beautiful, fat-free appearance with the Fat Freezer Chin and Neck Sculpting System! Designed to target common unsightly areas of the chin and neck, fast-cooling cryolipolysis technology expertly targets unwanted fat while improving the skin’s texture by helping shrink pores and smooth fine lines and wrinkles. For an effective post treatment, follow up with either Hot Massage or Ultrasonic Vibration mode.

 

 

Cellusage Body Vac Massager - Retail $99

The Cellusage Massager glides over the body and draws the skin into a vacuum, massaging fat deposits that can cause skin dimples or cellulite. Great to use after your Fat Freezing session.

 

 

Fat Freezer Facial Accelerator Cold Gel  - Retail $89

Add another level of cold therapy with the Accelerator Cold gel to freeze stubborn fat

 

 

$486 Retail – Reduced to Only $249!

 

 

Get Yours Today!

response.title: Protective Face Masks with Multiple Features
response.tagline: Triple layered, Eco Friendly and Washable cotton face masks by Covert Cotton

latest_updates.text:
Thank you so much for making our project a reality! A few things need to happen before we can kick off production and fulfillment.

Here's a quick rundown:

First, Indiegogo needs to transfer over the funds so we can make the rewards (this can take up to two weeks).

Second, we have to find out your mask colour choices and where we need to ship them. We’ll email you a BackerKit survey to collect this information.

You don’t need to create a BackerKit account to answer your survey. The email contains a link to your own personal survey. It's important to submit your response as quickly as you can since we need this information to process your rewards.     

If you need to change your survey response, purchase add-on items, or update your shipping information, you can click the link in your survey email again.

Again, thanks for your support. We can’t wait to send you your Covert Cotton masks!

Covert Cotton Team 

info@covertcotton.com

latest_updates.text:
Hey Guys,

First, let us thank you for your support. It is a tough time for the whole world, still, thanks to you we managed to reach our goal.

We have good news for you: the production of POMWE has already started. If nothing unpredictable happens, the batch will be ready on-time.

Here’s a sneak-peak from the production process:

            

Given this awesome fact, we are going to prolong our campaign here on Indiegogo. Please note that this does not affect the Shipping time in any way. We’re planning to start the shipping in June as promised, and so far there are no signs this can change.

Let us wrap this up with our best wishes for you guyses health and well-being in this tough situation.

Let us wrap this up with our best wishes for you guyses health and well-being in this tough situation.

response.title: HarmonicDyne Helios Dynamic Headphone
response.tagline: Customized 50mm German-Engineered Dynamic Driver, High-Definition Audio Performance, Walnut Housing

latest_updates.text:
Dear Helios Supporters,

 

We wish you are doing great and really appreciate your patience during these days!

 

Working continuously in days and nights, we are glad to announce that we have shipped all the parcels out! As the COVID-19 is still challenging the global shipment and worldwide production factories, we wouldn’t be able to accomplish our goal without your trust and support. 

 

All tracking numbers will be uploaded to Indiegogo in the next couple of days. If you have purchased the DHL express shipping, you can expect to receive your HarmonicDyne Helios headphone within the next 5 - 8 business days. For standard shipping, please kindly allow 10 - 30 days for the arrival, particularly considering the impact of COVID-19.

 

Additionally, we have received many feedbacks and inquiries regarding the headphone case. We sincerely apologise that we didn’t manage to update the last-minute change to you. Due to the COVID-19 epidemic outbreak, the factories couldn’t fulfil the headphone case orders. To ship the Helios to you as soon as possible, we have to make the change at the very last minute. To extend our apologies, we will provide a $10 Linsoul gift card to every HarmonicDyne Helios backer. 

 

As always, please feel free to reach out at Linsoultech@gmail.com if you have any questions.

 

Thanks so much for your understanding and support!

 

Stay tuned!

 

Sincerely,

HarmonicDyne and Linsoul Team

latest_updates.text:
The July batch is completed. Thank you!

The final stage payment is now closed for the July delivery. You may go ahead and make your final payment to be included in the August delivery.

If your initial contribution on the Indiegogo was a part of the July delivery but you didn't manage to make the final payment, please drop a line to prime@nireeka.com. We will do our best to add your bike to the list.

If you want to make sure your bike will be a part of the August delivery, you need to make the final payment before the end of April.

COMPLETE YOUR ORDER NOW

http://www.nireeka.com/shop/prime

 

Please use our LIVE CHAT if you had any questions.

 

Please share our campaign with your friends and family to help us make any impossible possible.

 

You’re the best and we can’t thank you enough.The Nireeka team

response.tagline: World's Fastest Charging Powerbank with 100W PD & Wireless Powered by Tesla™ graphene batteries

latest_updates.text:
Hi Backers,

Our first batch of Flash rewards have been shipped! Backers that fall in this category are our April backers who chose to only receive Flash 1.0. You will find that your tracking details have been emailed to you as well as uploaded to Backerkit. There was a lot of stress, anxiety and hard work on our end (given everything going on) and we’re ecstatic we have been able to make it work and stick to our scheduled timeline. We look forward to hearing your feedback and seeing pictures of Flash in action :)

Sharing our Flash packaging which we think is pretty kickass. Love it? Let us know in the comments.

For our remaining backers, we hope you feel reassured regarding the timeline of this campaign and know that we’re working tirelessly to ensure you receive your rewards soon as well. For remaining backers, we are still on schedule to begin shipping before the end of May. To make last minute changes to your survey, you can access it here: https://flash-powerbank.backerkit.com

Thank you for your support!

Chargeasap Team

response.title: Mu6 Space 2 Active Noise Cancelling Headphones
response.tagline: Hybrid ANC | Transparency Mode | 3D Touch | Superb Sound Quality | All Day Comfort | Voice Assistant

latest_updates.text:
Hey Backers ❤️

It’s been a while since our last update! Nice to catch you up!

 

Shipping Notice

All of your orders have been shipped out. Whoo~~

If you live in the US or EU area, and you haven’t received your order yet, do contact us (support@mu6.live) and we will help you out!

For backers outside the EU & US area, so sorry we weren’t able to ship out your order at the beginning of February due to the Corona Virus situation in China. And, your headphones are on their way to you. Stay tuned.

 

3D Intuitive Touch Control

Some of you pointed out it’s hard to control the right ear-cup. Let us help you out on how to control the device with your fingertip.

Smart Touch & Talk

Gently put your palm over the ear-cup, hold it. Give it a few seconds... one, two, three. Then you can hear the outside voices. Let go of your hand to return to the ANC world.

 

Connect with 2 Devices

Step 1: Connect with cellphone 1 and shut down the Bluetooth of the cellphone 1.

Step 2: Restart the Space 2 Headphones and pair them with the cellphone 2.

Step 3: Turn on the Bluetooth of the cellphone 1.

All set!

 

If you need any assistant, don’t hesitate to drop us an email! support@mu6.live

 

Loads of Love

Mu6 Team

response.title: Tanto - The World's First Premium Divot Tool
response.tagline: The first divot repair tool built to military grade specs.

latest_updates.text:
Backers,

This isn't the first crowdfunding project we've worked on, and yes, to date it's what we would call a subpar launch.. but golf is a game of recovery, right?

That is the "why" behind Tanto. We don't give up because we shanked our drive into the woods. We don't give up when we're standing over a  2' birdie putt, and somehow 3 putt for bogie. That's when we shine, and we make up for it on the back nine. 

We are ordering our first batch of inventory even if we don't receive 1 more backer because we know we're just on the front nine. Tanto is a quality tool that once you hold, it speaks for itself. We're so confident with that, we're prepared to make up for the 90% of the goal we didn't raise.

How You Can Help

That said, we want to incentivize our backers to help us - like a good friend helping to read a putt. So we started a Kickbooster program. If you choose to sign up and share your link on Facebook (or with friends) to help get more backers, we will give you 18% commission on all the backers you help get!

You can sign up here, and it takes only 1 minute: Sign Up For Referral Program

Help us grow the Tanto community, and we will help build new products the game is missing together. 

Thank you!

- Team Tanto

response.tagline: AI Human Recognition | PIR Motion Detection | Full Color Night Vision | 1080p Full HD

latest_updates.text:
Dear Backers,

 

All of your Vacos Cam are now on the way to your home.

 

Our team is now scanning all the cameras and checking everything is in perfect condition.

 

Due to the huge project and the delay logistics impacted by the pandemic, it would take around 1 week to finish all the scanning and confirmation work.

 

Upon we have finished the project, we will arrange the delivery to you directly! We used UPS to ship the products to your local countries. Please give us more time!

 

For US, UK, European and Australian customers, the tracking numbers will be updated to you after around 13 days. For Southeast Asia and other areas, the tracking numbers have been updated.

 

Please contact our support team at support@vacos.com directly for more details about the tracking.

 

Please accept our sincerest apologies and really appreciate your patience. We will keep pushing every process to make the cameras deliver to you ASAP.

 

Best regards,

Vacos Team

response.title: Pop-Up Pet Door 2.0 - It Lets the Dogs Out
response.tagline: Magnetically attaches to sliding glass doors & screens. Pops up in 5 secs and instantly folds away.

latest_updates.text:
Dear Supporters,

My name is Renee Kay.  I am the inventor of the Pop Up Pet Door.  I wanted to reach out to you personally and provide you with an update.  As you may know, we were able to raise enough through the Indiegogo campaign for us to get started on the tooling needed to produce Pop Up Pet Door 2.0.  They began manufacturing the necessary tools and then were hit with the coronavirus. This brought all the efforts to a halt. The factory workers are just now slowly returning back to work but they are very behind on their projects and have limited capabilities.  It is with a broken heart that I need to inform our supporters that unfortunately, because of the coronavirus, we will not be delivering the Pop Up Pet Door 2.0 for several months. 

We understand that many of you will be disappointed.  We are too. As many of you know, we have been selling version 1.0 for over a year and have thousands of very satisfied customers in 38 Countries. Version 1.0 has features that our customers love that 2.0 does not have.  Including, it can easily be modified to fit nearly every 80” or shorter sliding door or window and is simply attached with a strip of velcro. “Pop it up when you need it and take it down and completely lock your door” for your safety.  Pop Up Pet Door 1.0 was featured on Animal Planet, Hallmark Channel, GodTV, Good Day Utah, CityLine, Fox 5 Las Vegas, Fox 8 in San Diego, Pet Products Magazine and many others. We would like to offer to send you our Version 1.0 now so that you don’t have to wait any longer and when 2.0 is available, we will provide you with a code to buy version 2.0 at a huge discount.  

You can simply respond by emailing me at ThePetDoor@Gmail.Com and let me know what Address you would like us to use to ship you our Version 1.0 and what size you would like us to send.  You can check out the different sizes on PopUpPetDoor.Com OR you can simply just keep your order for version 2.0 and we will send it to you when it becomes available.  

Again, thank you for your support and understanding as we keep pressing on during this difficult time,

Renee

response.title: Wireless earbuds that eliminate ambient noise
response.tagline: Zenbuds feature active noise-canceling technology providing total immersion into your music

latest_updates.text:
Hey backers,

We would like to use this update to reiterate how much we appreciate your support thus far in our campaign. Our goal is to be 100% transparent with you over the final course of this campaign and keep you updated on each important step of our journey — including all of the ups and downs of this project that we’re so passionate about. 

Our team has worked hard to bring you Zenbuds. Regardless of how this Indiegogo campaign turned out, our team is committed to launching this brand simply because we believe in it… and people need better true wireless earbuds. However, we have decided to cancel the campaign.

Again, we appreciate your understanding and support. Be sure to like our Facebook page to see what’s in store for Zenbuds by clicking HERE. If you have any questions, please feel free to send a message via the Indiegogo page’s comments section, and we’ll get right back to you.

Best Regards,

The Keeps Audio Team

latest_updates.text:
April Update 

This month's update will be a relatively short one. 

As you know from our March Update, we have been waiting for a particular component from within China to complete the second version of our prototype. 

I am very happy to announce that the factory which creates that component has re-opened, we were also able to get the part we need relatively quickly from them.

A package containing all the components we have been waiting for is now being delivered to our R&D team from China right now and expected to arrive on Monday. 

This package includes everything such as the improved microphone, speaker and sensor samples to complete the second version of our prototype.

Once this prototype is completed we will assess it's quality and judge whether we feel it meets the standard we have set.

If it does - then we will be able to move towards mass production.

Shipping Dates

As you can probably tell from the update above, the April and May deliveries are unfortunately going to have to be pushed back.

We have set a preliminary delivery date for September 2020 at this moment, this has been decided after very careful consideration of our current progress and how we expect supply chains to be continually affected.

Unfortunately COVID-19 does not seem to be going away, global supply chain is still being affected heavily hence the September 2020 delivery date.

With that said, September is meant to be a conservative estimate meaning there is every chance that we could get these earbuds to you as early as late June, July or August. 

I want to take this opportunity to apologise for everyone who is disappointed by this news, but so am I and the rest of the team.

A lot of the delays and obstacles that the team faced was unexpected and frankly, not something that we could solve ourselves.

Regardless, we will continue to do our best to get these earbuds out to everyone.

Thanks for your understanding and continued support!

latest_updates.text:
Hello Backers!

We are writing to you today to update you once again on our production timeline, in regards to the COVID 19 Pandemic, which is affecting businesses world wide.  Although our factory is back up an running in China, there are still severe delays to production. However, we are moving through this as best we can, and working day and night to minimise any delays to each of your individual shipments. We will have another update very soon with an approximate delivery date for your orders. 

For anyone dealing with the virus, or has a friend/family member who is, our thoughts and prayers are with you. 

Please stay tuned for further updates, and in the mean time please keep sharing our social media pages and website:

Website: https://canchabags.com

Instagram: @canchabags

Facebook: https://facebook.com/canchabags

 

Best Wishes,

The Cancha Team
